definition: To come across someone or something, often by chance or arrangement, with the intention of meeting or encountering them. It is commonly used to describe the act of meeting someone in person, arranging a meeting, or encountering someone unexpectedly.

examples.german: Ich treffe meine Freunde heute Abend.
examples.english: I am meeting my friends tonight.

examples.german: Wir haben uns gestern zum Mittagessen getroffen.
Er hat seinen Chef im Büro getroffen.
examples.english: He met his boss in the office.

examples.german: Wir treffen uns immer am selben Ort.
examples.english: We always meet at the same place.
